home.title: Welcome to your cultural cocoon
home.kuriusWelcome: Hi there! Ready to explore new horizons? Tell me about a story that transported you!

dialogue.step0_premium: Hello! Ready to create a new memory? First, tell me who you'd like to share it with.
dialogue.step1: What a beautiful day for an activity! What would you like to do?
dialogue.step2: Excellent choice! Who will be lucky enough to join this moment?
dialogue.step3_refine: Great! Now, tell me more about what you're looking for. Tell me about genres, themes, or even works you've loved.
dialogue.step4_generate: Perfect! Everything is ready. I'll find the ideal activity for you...
dialogue.refine_placeholder: e.g., 'A light horror movie', 'A dystopian sci-fi book', 'A comedy series that makes everyone laugh'...

plus.title: Kurius Plus
plus.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of your cultural cocoon.
plus.feature1_description: Go beyond your home. Invite friends, create events, and vote together in real-time, no matter where you are.
plus.feature2_description: Unlock detailed, personalized explanations for every recommendation, transforming every choice into a discovery.
plus.feature3_description: Bring the experience to life with Kurius's signature voice for all AI commentary.
plus.feature4_description: Build a lasting, shared archive of all the great moments and stories your circles have experienced together.
plus.disclaimer: Note for the jury: The payment system is not implemented. This screen simulates the value proposition of the app's business model.
